comments.commentText: Though it seems the drag feature could be improved. But overall it looks good I think. I have adjusted the design and the responsiveness at various breakpoints works really well.

replies.commentText: Woah, your project looks awesome! How long have you been coding for? I’m still new, but think I want to dive into React as well soon. Perhaps you can give me an insight on where I can learn React? Thanks!
If you’re still new, I’d recommend focusing on the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS before considering React. It’s very tempting to jump ahead but lay a solid foundation first.
You could also check this website: codingisfun.com. They have a great blog with tons of resources!
